movies.title: PUSS IN BOOTS: THE LAST WISH
movies.description: Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll: he has burned through eight of his nine lives. Puss sets out on an epic journey to find the mythical Last Wish and restore his nine lives.

movies.title: BLACK PANTHER: WAKANDA FOREVER
movies.description: The nation of Wakanda is pitted against intervening world powers as they mourn the loss of their king T'Challa.

movies.title: AVATAR: THE WAY OF WATER
movies.description: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the planet of Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their planet.

movies.title: BLACK ADAM
movies.description: Nearly 5,000 years after he was bestowed with the almighty powers of the Egyptian gods-and imprisoned just as quickly-Black Adam (Johnson) is freed from his earthly tomb, ready to unleash his unique form of justice on the modern world.

movies.title: THE MENU
movies.description: A young couple travel to a remote island to eat at an exclusive restaurant where the chef has prepared a lavish menu, with some shocking surprises.

movies.title: SWORD ART ONLINE THE MOVIE: PROGRESSIVE
movies.description: This anime movie spawned by the popular franchise focuses on Asuna and her friend Misumi as they find themselves trapped inside the VR death game Sword Art Online.

movies.title: PIL'S ADVENTURES
movies.description: A spunky young girl disguises herself as a princess in order to save the kingdom and the heir to the throne.

movies.title: DRISHYAM 2
movies.description: 7 years after the case related to Vijay Salgaonkar and his family was closed, a series of unexpected events bring a truth to light that threatens to change everything for the Salgaonkars. Can Vijay save his family this time?.

movies.title: VIOLENT NIGHT
movies.description: When a group of mercenaries attack the estate of a wealthy family, Santa Claus must step in to save the day (and Christmas).

movies.title: SUMMIT FEVER
movies.description: A daring dream to scale the world's most challenging trio of mountains soon turns into a terrifying nightmare for a group of friends when a deadly storm traps the climbers near the summit and cuts off all hope of rescue. The friends are forced to trust each other to save themselves by any means necessary.

movies.title: IT
movies.description: When children in town begin to disappear, a group of young kids is faced with their biggest fears as they square off against an evil clown named Pennywise.

movies.title: Top Gun: Maverick
movies.description: Set 30 years after the events of `Top Gun` (1986), the sequel hinges on Captain Pete Mitchell`s (Tom Cruise) attempts to come to terms with his past, while training his friend`s son (Miles Teller) for a dangerous mission.

movies.title: I Remember You
movies.description: This horror drama focuses on a couple`s nightmarish adventures in a small abandoned town with a dark history.

movies.title: Boxing Day
movies.description: Melvin`s (Aml Ameen) fairytale proposal to his girlfriend on Boxing Day goes spectacularly wrong, when he`s confronted with the ghosts of his past.
